title: HAP 107 - Lewis Gordon on Frantz Fanon
itunes:title: HAP 107 - Lewis Gordon on Frantz Fanon
description: We're joined by a leading Fanon expert to talk about a range of themes in his work: Negritude, psychiatry, and violence.
